arts.ttl: Stuttgart beat Leipzig to reach German Cup final
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart battled past RB Leipzig 3-1 on Wednesday to reach the German Cup final for the first time in 12 years and pile more misery on their crisis-hit opponents.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Stuttgart 3-1 RB Leipzig: Stiller and Woltemade show secure first DFB Pokal final for VfB since 2013
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart secured their first DFB Pokal since 2012/13 after beating RB Leipzig 2-1 with goals from Angelo Stiller, Nick Woltemade and Jamie Leweling. Sebastian HoeneÃŸâ€™ side had to withstandâ€¦

arts.ttl: Stuttgart book their place in DFB-Pokal final
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart booked their place in the DFB-Pokal final as they beat RB Leipzig 3-1 in front of a rapturous crowd in Bad Cannstatt.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs. RB Leipzig (2 de Abr., 2025) Resultados en Vivo

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: VfB Stuttgart vs. RB Leipzig
arts.sum: The lineups have been announced ahead of tonight's DFB-Pokal semi-final between VfB Stuttgart and RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Long list of suitors for Xavi Simons â€“ summer move on the cards?
arts.sum: Four Premier League giants are said to be interested in Xavi Simons, with a summer move away from RB Leipzig appearing to be a real possibility.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart raise asking price for Woltemade
arts.sum: According to Sport Bild, VfB Stuttgart have upped their asking price for Nick Woltemade amid the hype and interest surrounding the striker.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: What Oliver Glasner now wants from Crystal Palace as Tottenham and RB Leipzig lurk
RB Leipzig hold talks with Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasnerâ€™s mangement over permanent head coach position
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that RB Leipzig are in contact with the management of Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner over becoming their head coach in the summer. Following the sacking of Marcoâ€¦

arts.ttl: Marco Rose rockets up next Rangers manager betting but first domino falling grabs Tottenham's attention
arts.sum: An interesting stand-off between Rangers and Tottenham could lie ahead if the stars align
